text: Knema rufa is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to Borneo. ==References== * de Wilde, W.J.J.O. 1998. Knema rufa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. rufa Category:Endemic flora of Borneo Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Knema rufa
